name: Hack Computer
description:
Feel the exhilaration in the life of a Hacker!

Your clients require your help to complete highly classified missions such as Hacking vaults, briefcases, computers, tablets and even high-tech machines! You will be provided with tasks to practice hacking to hone your skillset as the worlds greatest Hacker! Communicate with your clients to get a mission briefing and get rewarded if the job is completed successfully.

Just make sure you don't get caught!

Hack Computer features:
-An exciting new simulator
-Hack computers!
-Become the worlds best hacker
